name: Slime from space
description:
You are a slime from space but maybe something happens, and u need to use your slime skills to maybe build or rebuild something. No spoilers tho

Use arrow keys to move
I recommend playing in full screen mode (right bottom corner is button that does this)

My first game, made for the first gdevelop game jam with theme build/rebuild, what a coincidence :D
I worked on this with my friend 0289137

Sorry for any bugs and ugly stuff :"D
